00054         Button::Button(ConstString& name, const Vector2 Position, const Vector2 Size, UILayer* Layer)
00055             : Parent(Layer),
00056               NormalSprite(NULL),
00057               HoveredSprite(NULL),
00058               UserSprite(NULL),
00059               Callback(NULL),
00060               MouseHover(false),
00061               IsText(false),
00062               RelPosition(Position),
00063               RelSize(Size),
00064               Name(name)
00065         {
00066             Manager = World::GetWorldPointer()->GetUIManager();
00067 
00068             Vector2 Window = Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00069             GorillaRectangle = Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->createRectangle((Position * Window).GetOgreVector2(),(Size * Window).GetOgreVector2());
00070         }
00071 
00072         Button::~Button()
00073         {
00074             Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->destroyRectangle(GorillaRectangle);
00075         }
00076 
00077         void Button::SetVisible(bool Visible)
00078         {
00079             GorillaRectangle->SetVisible(Visible);
00080         }
00081 
00082         bool Button::IsVisible()
00083         {
00084             return GorillaRectangle->IsVisible();
00085         }
00086 
00087         void Button::Show()
00088         {
00089             GorillaRectangle->Show();
00090         }
00091 
00092         void Button::Hide()
00093         {
00094             GorillaRectangle->Hide();
00095         }
00096 
00097         ConstString& Button::GetName()
00098         {
00099             return Name;
00100         }
00101 
00102         bool Button::IsTextButton()
00103         {
00104             return IsText;
00105         }
00106 
00107         void Button::SetButtonCallback(ButtonCallback* Call)
00108         {
00109             Callback = Call;
00110         }
00111 
00112         bool Button::CheckMouseHover()
00113         {
00114             if(!GorillaRectangle->IsVisible())
00115                 return false;
00116             Vector2 MouseLoc = Manager->GetGameWorld()->GetEventManager()->GetMouseCoords();
00117             if(GorillaRectangle->intersects(MouseLoc.GetOgreVector2()))
00118             {
00119                 if(!MouseHover && HoveredSprite)
00120                 {
00121                     GorillaRectangle->background_image(HoveredSprite);
00122                 }
00123                 MouseHover = true;
00124             }else{
00125                 if(MouseHover && HoveredSprite)
00126                 {
00127                     GorillaRectangle->background_image(NormalSprite);
00128                 }
00129                 MouseHover = false;
00130             }
00131             if(Callback)
00132                 Callback->DoCallbackItems();
00133             return MouseHover;
00134         }
00135 
00136         bool Button::GetMouseHover()
00137         {
00138             return MouseHover;
00139         }
00140 
00141         void Button::SetBackgroundColour(const ColourValue& Colour)
00142         {
00143             GorillaRectangle->background_colour(Colour.GetOgreColourValue());
00144         }
00145 
00146         void Button::SetBackgroundSprite(const String& Name)
00147         {
00148             Gorilla::Sprite* GSprite = Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->_getSprite(Name);
00149             NormalSprite = GSprite;
00150             GorillaRectangle->background_image(GSprite);
00151         }
00152 
00153         void Button::SetHoveredSprite(const String& Name)
00154         {
00155             Gorilla::Sprite* GSprite = Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->_getSprite(Name);
00156             HoveredSprite = GSprite;
00157         }
00158 
00159         void Button::SetUserSprite(const String& Name)
00160         {
00161             Gorilla::Sprite* GSprite = Parent->GetGorillaLayer()->_getSprite(Name);
00162             UserSprite = GSprite;
00163         }
00164 
00165         void Button::EnableUserSprite(bool Enable)
00166         {
00167             if(Enable)
00168             {
00169                 GorillaRectangle->background_image(UserSprite);
00170             }else{
00171                 GorillaRectangle->background_image(NormalSprite);
00172             }
00173         }
00174 
00175         void Button::SetBorder(const Real Width, const ColourValue& Colour)
00176         {
00177             GorillaRectangle->border(Width, Colour.GetOgreColourValue());
00178         }
00179 
00180         void Button::NoBorder()
00181         {
00182             GorillaRectangle->no_border();
00183         }
00184 
00185         void Button::SetPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00186         {
00187             RelPosition = Position;
00188             Vector2 CurrDim = Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00189             GorillaRectangle->left(CurrDim.X * RelPosition.X);
00190             GorillaRectangle->top(CurrDim.Y * RelPosition.Y);
00191         }
00192 
00193         Vector2 Button::GetPosition()
00194         {
00195             return RelPosition;
00196         }
00197 
00198         void Button::SetActualPosition(const Vector2 Position)
00199         {
00200             GorillaRectangle->left(Position.X);
00201             GorillaRectangle->top(Position.Y);
00202         }
00203 
00204         Vector2 Button::GetActualPosition()
00205         {
00206             Vector2 Pos(GorillaRectangle->left(), GorillaRectangle->top());
00207             return Pos;
00208         }
00209 
00210         void Button::SetSize(const Vector2 Size)
00211         {
00212             RelSize = Size;
00213             Vector2 CurrDim = Manager->GetWindowDimensions();
00214             GorillaRectangle->width(CurrDim.X * RelSize.X);
00215             GorillaRectangle->height(CurrDim.Y * RelSize.Y);
00216         }
00217 
00218         Vector2 Button::GetSize()
00219         {
00220             return RelSize;
00221         }
00222 
00223         void Button::SetActualSize(const Vector2 Size)
00224         {
00225             GorillaRectangle->width(Size.X);
00226             GorillaRectangle->height(Size.Y);
00227         }
00228 
00229         Vector2 Button::GetActualSize()
00230         {
00231             Vector2 Pos(GorillaRectangle->width(), GorillaRectangle->height());
00232             return Pos;
00233         }
00234 
00235         void Button::SetRenderPriority(UI::RenderPriority Priority)
00236         {
00237             Gorilla::RenderPriority RP;
00238             switch(Priority)
00239             {
00240                 case UI::RP_Low:
00241                     RP = Gorilla::RP_Low;
00242                     break;
00243                 case UI::RP_Medium:
00244                     RP = Gorilla::RP_Medium;
00245                     break;
00246                 case UI::RP_High:
00247                     RP = Gorilla::RP_High;
00248                     break;
00249                 default:
00250                     break;
00251             }
00252             GorillaRectangle->RenderPriority(RP);
00253         }
00254 
00255         UI::RenderPriority Button::GetRenderPriority()
00256         {
00257             Gorilla::RenderPriority RP = this->GorillaRectangle->RenderPriority();
00258             switch(RP)
00259             {
00260                 case Gorilla::RP_Low:
00261                     return UI::RP_Low;
00262                     break;
00263                 case Gorilla::RP_Medium:
00264                     return UI::RP_Medium;
00265                     break;
00266                 case Gorilla::RP_High:
00267                     return UI::RP_High;
00268                     break;
00269                 default:
00270                     break;
00271             }
00272             return UI::RP_Medium;
00273         }
00274

00281         }
